props.iconColor: Applies specified color to the control - it can be the name of material color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). You can find list of built in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).
props.left: Explicitly set the item to a left orientation
props.right: Explicitly set the item to a right orientation

slots.icon: Used to customize the icon inside the timeline item's dot
slots.opposite: Used to customize the opposite side of timeline items
